item.title: Kinetic Project - Concepts and Brainstorming
item.description: For our Kinetic Energy assignment for the Energy class, I partnered up with Arnav. We came up with a few concepts for how to turn human motion into light. Hand-Crank Music Box The first thing we explored was turning a hand-crank music box into a music box that emits light. We would connect a motor to the end of the crank shaft and have that generate electricity. Weelchair Powered Light We explored using the wheelchair on the ITP floor for kinetic energy - it could work in one of two ways.
